mapper.select: SELECT re_comment_id AS reCommentId, comment_id AS commentId, board_id AS boardnum, m.num as num, content, m.id AS commentWriter, regdate FROM re_comment r, member m WHERE r.num = m.num AND comment_id = #{commentId};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO re_comment(comment_id, board_id, content, num) VALUES(#{commentId},#{boardnum},#{content},#{num})
